title: Completed PE Summary - Neptune
raw_html:
Category Fishing
Registered Owner & Manager: Mr R P Irvine
Port of registry: Lerwick
Flag: UK
Type: Fish catching/processing
Built: 1991
Construction: Steel
Length overall: 26.61
Gross tonnage: 255.00
Date & Time 17/05/03 23:01
Location of incident: Foreign high seas
Incident Type: Flooding/Foundering
Injuries/ fatalities: None
Damage/ Pollution: Ship lost

Synopsis

The vessel flooded and foundered to the north of the Shetland Isles.

Action taken:

To prevent a similar accident occurring in the future, the owners were recommended to ensure the following on any fishing vessel that they own in the future

  • Watertight bulkheads are maintained in watertight condition throughout the life of the vessel

  • Bilge alarms, with visual and audible signal, should be fitted in all the main watertight compartments

  • A television should not be fitted in the wheelhouse

Synopsis

The vessel flooded and foundered to the north of the Shetland Isles. 

Action taken:

To prevent a similar accident occurring in the future, the owners were recommended to ensure the following on any fishing vessel that they own in the future

  * Watertight bulkheads are maintained in watertight condition throughout the life of the vessel 

  * Bilge alarms, with visual and audible signal, should be fitted in all the main watertight compartments
